1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Ex chekbej Jehová, jalek watx' k'anej bay. Alek watx' k'anej bay Cham, mac ex ayex ec' yul is templo yet ak'balil.</t>
2: <t>Iek aj e k'ab bay yul is templo, cax che yalon watx' k'anej bay Cham.</t>
3: <t>Aokab Jehová Cham max esnen aj satcan c'al tx'otx' tx'otx', chi yak' watx'c'ulal e yiban tac'al bay tzalan Sión.</t>
